wikipedia_page.main: James Derek Birchall  (7 October 1930 – 7 December 1995) was an English inorganic chemist, materials scientist, and inventor who spent most of his career working for Imperial Chemical Industries. He is known for his research on the health effects of exposure to silica and alumina.

response: *James Derek Birchall (1930–1995), English chemist and inventor
